question: Which Union Ministry along with Invest India, is to set up a “Strategic Policy & Facilitation Bureau"?
option4: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
explanation:
The Ministry of AYUSH and Invest India will collaborate to set up a “Strategic Policy & Facilitation Bureau".
Invest India will collaborate with the AYUSH Ministry to frame the work plan of the Bureau and define its targets. It will also deploy expert resources to implement and execute the plans of the AYUSH Ministry.
